name: Lonely Boy
wikiSummary: The first release off the upcoming album 'El Camino' - Out December 6th, 2011 The Lonely Boy Songfacts explains that the music video features one Derrick T. Tuggle dancing to the song in the lobby of a motel. Tuggle was originally cast as an extra, but when the director saw him dancing, he asked him to perform.
wikiText: The first release off the upcoming album 'El Camino' - Out December 6th, 2011 The Lonely Boy Songfacts explains that the music video features one Derrick T. Tuggle dancing to the song in the lobby of a motel. Tuggle was originally cast as an extra, but when the director saw him dancing, he asked him to perform.
